articles.title: Samsung replaces Google AI with Baidu AI on Galaxy S24 devices in China - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
Hong Kong, Jan 26 (IANS): Samsung will not use Galaxy AI features in its Galaxy S24 lineup in China and would instead rely upon Chinese tech giant Baidu’s Ernie AI, owing to Google’s limited presence in the country.
Ernie AI will offer same Galaxy AI feature…

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Samsung's new phones replace Google AI with Baidu in China - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung is tapping Chinese tech giant Baidu to power the Galaxy S24’s Galaxy AI features in China. There’s no mention of Google, whose tech appears elsewhere.

articles.title: Ola founder’s AI startup becomes unicorn in $50M funding - TechCrunch
articles.description: Krutrim, an AI startup founded by Ola founder Bhavish Aggarwal, said it has raised a funding round that values it at $1 billion. The startup, founded last AI firm Krutrim is Indian entrepreneur Bhavish Aggarwal's third unicorn startup.
